commands.name: start
commands.title: Start Monitoring
commands.subtitle: SerialPlotter
commands.description: This command will open SerialPlotter and start monitoring the serial port, if anything is connected.

commands.name: stop
commands.title: Stop Monitoring
commands.subtitle: SerialPlotter
commands.description: This command will stop the monitoring in SerialPlotter if it's currently running.

commands.name: toggle
commands.title: Toggle Monitoring
commands.subtitle: SerialPlotter
commands.description: This command will start/stop monitoring in SerialPlotter based on its current state.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
